sentences.sentence: Season of mists and mellow fruitfulness!
sentences.translation: 雾气弥散、瓜果飘香的成熟之季！

sentences.sentence: Explanatory power is only one test of a theory's fruitfulness.
sentences.translation: 解释力仅仅是一个理论是否富有成效的检验标准之一。

sentences.sentence: God will make our love fruitful, whether we see that fruitfulness or not.
sentences.translation: 无论我们能不能眼见丰收，天主都会使我们的爱硕果累累。
